short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the case of selected text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Change Case extension helps you quickly and easily transform the formatting of selected text in your Chrome browser. Whether you need UPPERCASE, lowercase, Title Case, camelCase, PascalCase, CONSTANT_CASE, param-case, snake_case, or dot.case, this extension provides a simple and efficient solution. Key Features: New: Add Hyphens - Quickly add hyphens between words in the selected text. New: Remove Hyphens - Instantly remove hyphens from the selected text. New: Insert
Tag - Easily add a
tag at the end of the selected text. New: Remove   - Remove non-breaking spaces from the selected content. UPPERCASE: Convert text to all uppercase letters. lowercase: Change text to all lowercase letters. Title Case: Capitalize the first letter of each word. camelCase: Transform text to camel case. PascalCase: Convert text to Pascal case. CONSTANT_CASE: Change text to uppercase with underscores. param-case: Convert text to lowercase with hyphens. snake_case: Transform text to lowercase with underscores. dot.case: Change text to lowercase with dots. Benefits: Efficiency: Quickly change text cases or add/remove formatting directly from the context menu. Versatility: Supports multiple text case formats and additional formatting options. User-Friendly: Intuitive right-click menu for easy access. Consistency: Maintain uniform text formatting and HTML structure across your projects. How to Use: Highlight the text you want to modify. Right-click to open the context menu. Select 'CHANGE CASE' and choose the desired case format or formatting option. Instantly see the transformed or updated text.
